snippet.title: Burn, destroy, wreck, kill: Soccer's Pig War produces spies and battle cries in the Pacific Northwest
snippet.description:
Burn, destroy, wreck, kill: Soccer's Pig War produces spies and battle cries in the Pacific Northwest by Matt Negrin on Mar 26 2014, 10:56a
In 1859, an American farmer in the Northwest shot and killed a pig that was on his land. The pig belonged to an Irishman, who demanded $100 in repayment. Instead, the two men feuded for years, a...

snippet.title: The worst of the Richie Incognito/Jonathan Martin report
snippet.description:
The worst of the Richie Incognito/Jonathan Martin report by Ryan Van Bibber on Feb 14 2014, 11:27a
Ted Wells released his report about Incognito's harassment of Miami Dolphins teammate Martin on Friday. What follows are several examples of the behavior Martin and others were forced to endure.

snippet.title: What happened at the last World Cup draw in Brazil?
snippet.description:
What happened at the last World Cup draw in Brazil? by Andi Thomas on Dec 5 2013, 3:38p
We take a look at the qualification and draw for the 1950 World Cup in Brazil, perhaps the strangest in history.

snippet.title: Phil Moss appointed manager at Central Coast Mariners
snippet.description:
Phil Moss appointed manager at Central Coast Mariners by Michael Orr on Nov 14 2013, 5:18p
The assistant under Graham Arnold has been promoted and will remain in charge in Gosford through 2015/16.

snippet.title: SB Nation’s 2014 World Cup Draw Preview
snippet.description:
SB Nation’s 2014 World Cup Draw Preview by Kevin McCauley on Dec 4 2013, 2:00p
The World Cup draw takes place on Friday and SB Nation is here to get you ready with everything you need to know about the 32 qualified teams.

snippet.title: Ange Postecoglou leaving Melbourne Victory for Socceroos job
snippet.description:
Ange Postecoglou leaving Melbourne Victory for Socceroos job by Michael Orr on Oct 22 2013, 10:46p
The second year Victory manager has two A-League championships from his time at Brisbane Roar and coached the inaugural A-League All-Star team.

snippet.title: Enfield adventures: A taste of the Tottenham Hotspur academy
snippet.description:
Enfield adventures: A taste of the Tottenham Hotspur academy by Graham MacAree on Jul 18 2013, 11:08a
"We'll start with the beep test, and then there'll be a two-mile run."

snippet.title: Seems like a sport: Watching every Fast and Furious movie in a row
snippet.description:
Seems like a sport: Watching every Fast and Furious movie in a row by Jeb Lund on May 30 2013, 12:51p
We're not sure if watching every Fast and Furious movie in a row is a sport, but it certainly requires at least 13 hours of endurance.

snippet.title: Branding Brooklyn
snippet.description:
Branding Brooklyn by Brandon K. Thorp on Nov 1 2012, 11:41a
It's 9:37 p.m. on a late summer's Friday outside the modest housing project at the corner of Classon Avenue and Lefferts Place, in the gentrifying southwestern corner of Brooklyn’s Clinton Hill,...
